title.value: Влияние композиционных полимерных составов (пленкообразующих полимеров) на степень ветвления однолетних саженцев плодовых культур
The influence of composite polymeric compounds (film-forming resins) on branching degree of annual seedlings of fruit crops

person.name: Samus, V.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies of composite polymeric compounds (film-forming resins) on the development index of annual seedlings of fruit crops, i.e. their branching degree. A positive postaction of the agent Korpansil application (1 liter of a concentrate per 5 liters of water) on the side shoots formation was revealed. It was established, that application of the agent Korpansil (1 liter of a concentrate per 5 liters of water) provided formation at the apple (Malus) tree of 3 – 5 shoots of 12,8 – 15,3 cm in length; at a pear tree (Pyrus Cydonia ) – 4 shoots of 33,5 – 46,5 cm in length; at plum (Prunus L.) seedlings – 14 – 17 unites of 28,8 – 46,5 cm in length; at a sweet cherry (Prunus avium L.) tree – 5 – 6 side shoots of 68 – 73,2 cm in length. It was economically reasonable to use the agent Korpansil in the concentration of 1 I of the concentrate per 5 l of water for enriching the indicators quality of seedlings and increasing the output of a standard planting material.
